name: Star Loop (DannyIsYog, MiguelSeabra1999, Fowlron, Sofia Ribeiro, Space_Shoe)

Left Thruster/Right Thruster :::: ::::Driving mode changed to: On.click, change thruster. :::: :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: Made for Nordic Game Jam 2022, with the themes: Art Style - Doodles Mechanics - Waves |||StarWave Team||| Fábio "DannyIsYog" Sousa - Programming, Comic Relief Manuel "The Space_Shoe" Menezes - Technical Art, Art Miguel Seabra - Programming, Level Designer Pedro "Fowlron" Godinho - Programming, Enemy Design Sofia "WavyDave" Ribeiro - 2D Art, UI

We are part of a college game dev group called GameDev Técnico.

You can find us here!
